cmd_responses.!Help: This chat is for OCS class #1 or #2, I forgot. This class will commence on the 24 of July. Chat owner is Bobby Picone. Please when joining state your name, designator, and age. As well as a short intro.
cmd_responses.!Class: Study sessions are typically at 8 o'clock CST. Zoom links will be posted in the chat.
